# camunda-8-api-postman-collection
Collect all public API for Camunda Platform 8 into a single Postman collection to be easily used by folks

# Run Collections directly in Postman:

**[Camunda Platform 8 - Public API Workspace](https://www.postman.com/restless-shuttle-19836/workspace/camunda-platform-8/)** 

**Camunda Cloud Management API** 
[![Camunda Cloud Management API](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/20317927-4c378140-b9ca-4f2d-b4d5-479ab0fcc472?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D20317927-4c378140-b9ca-4f2d-b4d5-479ab0fcc472%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3Dab1978e0-fee0-4dba-832e-53bdd2a6baa5#?env%5BNew%20Environment%)

**Share Operate Public API - SaaS**
[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/20317927-d18294fc-dc5a-4729-8dee-17d6985269e9?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D20317927-d18294fc-dc5a-4729-8dee-17d6985269e9%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3Dab1978e0-fee0-4dba-832e-53bdd2a6baa5#?env%5BNew%20Environment%)

**Share Operate Public API - Self-Managed**
[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/20317927-4cdcc6f4-88af-4d88-a345-270135f8a4c4?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D20317927-4cdcc6f4-88af-4d88-a345-270135f8a4c4%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3Dab1978e0-fee0-4dba-832e-53bdd2a6baa5#?env%5BNew%20Environment%)

**TaskList Public GraphQL API**
[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/20317927-6394943f-b57c-4c04-acf9-391a8614103b?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D20317927-6394943f-b57c-4c04-acf9-391a8614103b%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3Dab1978e0-fee0-4dba-832e-53bdd2a6baa5#?env%5BNew%20Environment%)
